Issue.summary: Cannot launch two instances of the application
Issue.description: Cannot launch two instances of the application at the same time.
The current generated UI is quite functional but it could improve on usability.

Issue.summary: Why am I forced to assign values before linking a new object with another object?
Issue.description: Why am I forced to assign values before linking a new object with another object? I get a 400 error if I link a new object before assigning values to all required properties. Linking at the end works though.

Issue.summary: When I have a collection of references, I want to associate/dissociate, not create/delete from the peer
Issue.description: Imagine an issue and its labels. Or a person and its friends. I should be able to attach/detach labels to/from an issue or friends to/from a person but not create/delete them as they are meant to be shared, they are not child objects (creation could be allowed as a convenience, but it would mean no special relationship with the contextual peer).

Comment.commented: Good catch, we will fix that right away.
We hear you but this is too vague for us to address, we need more specific enhancement requests.
